0.text: Hi guys, Christel here reporting from the Excel Exhibition and Convention Centre London

4.text: This week we'll be bringing you a special episode of The Fan Show straight from MCN Comic Con London

17.text: Hi Christel, who are you cosplaying?

19.text: I'm cosplaying as the twelfth Doctor- Peter Capaldi

22.text: I thought it's not going to be complete without the eyebrows

24.text: so I bought some fuzzy felt eyebrows off of Ebay

28.text: and put them on my face.

30.text: A lot of the characters have really cool costumes and a-

35.text: Hang on a minute, why are you interviewing me?

38.text: We're meant to be interviewing the cosplayers?

41.text: Clara Oswald from series 9 coming up

43.text: The tenth Doctor and Rose from the episode The Idiot's Lantern

46.text: I'm dressed as the War Doctor

48.text: I'm cosplaying the 3rd Doctor from Doctor Who

51.text: I'm Jenny Flint from Doctor Who

54.text: Fantastic and can you tell what inspired you to dress up as these characters?

57.text: He only get's one appearance so there's not much to judge on

60.text: but I like the fact that there is a Doctor who was in The War

63.text: I was a weeping angel last time and I couldn't move so i decided on something a little more comfortable

67.text: Just been a fan for a long time

69.text: and I like John Pertwee's Doctor

71.text: Well i've been cosplaying her for a couple of years

75.text: She's clever, she's funny you know?

80.text: How long did it take to put together?

84.text: I had to get a lot of it from army surplus stores and mostly Ebay

88.text: I threw it together between the end of the finale and MCN in November

95.text: Took me a while as I was grabbing bits off Ebay

98.text: And what do you love most about Cosplay?

99.text: Cosplay- it's just so much fun! It's like being a kid again!

102.text: It's a society where you can hang out with people who have similar interests to you

107.text: You can walk around in silly outfits and people take photos of you. It's like being a celebrity for a day, sort of

111.text: We're all a bit barmy and you get to be really silly

121.text: Smaller than the last great time war!

124.text: The sense of freedom I think

126.text: and also the belonging. You get a few funny looks on the train

132.text: but as soon as you get here and everybody else is dressed up- it's all different

137.text: but everybody has that common link and you get to chat to people and they're so friendly

163.text: What an amazing day at MCN London Comic Con

166.text: We've met loads of fantastic Cosplayers

168.text: but I think our Cosplayer of the Week has to go to

173.text: This Missy absolutely made our day and she was in character the whole time

177.text: And she kissed every single twelfth Doctor in sight

182.text: If you attended MCN Comic Con this week

184.text: Or any convention then show us your photos at

188.text: And don't forget to check out our favourite videos in our WhoTube annotation attack.

195.text: It's goodbye from me and it's goodbye from him...
